text: Jubal Anderson Early (November 3, 1816 â€“ March 2, 1894) was a Confederate general in the American Civil War. He commanded a corps in Robert E. Lee's Army of Northern Virginia. He invaded the north in 1864. After the war, he was one of the major defenders of the Confederate. == References == Category:1816 births Category:1894 deaths Category:Confederate Army generals Category:Military people from Virginia
title: Jubal Early
